title: misc/cgo/testshared: fails on tip
body:
It may be caused by an older gccgo binary in PATH. (The test-suite for google's go probably should not run tests for the ian's gccgo.)
```
cd src
./all.bash
...
##### ../misc/cgo/testshared
2015/08/09 13:47:31 elf.Open failed: open /tmp/testshared202072202/pkg/gccgo_linux_amd64_5577006791947779410_fPIC/shlibs/libdep.so: no such file or directory
exit status 1
FAIL	_/opt/gotip/misc/cgo/testshared	7.574s
2015/08/09 13:47:31 Failed: exit status 1

tree /tmp/testshared202072202/pkg/
/tmp/testshared202072202/pkg/
└── linux_amd64_5577006791947779410_dynlink
    ├── dep2.a
    ├── dep2.shlibname
    ├── dep.a
    ├── dep.shlibname
    ├── libdep2.so
    └── libdep.so
```
../bin/go version
go version devel +3ae1704 Fri Aug 7 17:55:26 2015 +0000 linux/amd64
